title: Database Security Capabilities of CockroachDB
description:
In last week's episode of The Cockroach Hour, Jim Walker chatted with Cockroach Labs PMs Piyush Singh and Tommy Truongchau, along with security lead Aaron Blum, to talk about security features in CockroachDB. The full video is available here, and the transcript is below.
Jim Walker:
Hello, everybody. Good morning. Good, evening. Good, afternoon. No matter where you're at on this glorious planet today. It's beautiful and sunny here in Denver, Colorado.

title: Interview with Meinte Boersma on Domain-Specific Languages
